Skull.Description:
A polished skull from some creature, it's cold to the touch.

Lv.{0}: {1}
Skull.AbilityDescription.1: Summon a haunted skull; deals 20-30 damage to any enemies that get close.
Skull.AbilityDescription.2: Summon a haunted skull; that deals 30-40 damage to any enemies that get close.
Skull.AbilityDescription.3: Summon a haunted skull; that deals 40-50 damage to any enemies that get close.
Bat.Description:
A colorful wing from a ghastly bat.

Lv.{0}: {1}
Bat.AbilityDescription.1: Summon a bat; when you land a critical hit, recover 13 HP and 13 Energy.
Bat.AbilityDescription.2: Summon a bat; when you land a critical hit, recover 13% of the damage dealt as HP and Energy, can only activate once per 2s.
Stick.AbilityDescription.1: Summon a stickbug; harvests nearby forage and heal 10%~20% HP.
DustSpirit.AbilityDescription.1: Summon 3 dust spirits; every 10s, break nearby rocks and grant +20 attack.
DustSpirit.AbilityDescription.2: Summon 3 dust spirits; every 2s, break nearby rocks and grant +5 attack.
Spider.Description:
A tiny plastic spider on some decorative webbing, scuttles around sometimes.

Lv.{0}: {1}
Spider.AbilityDescription.1: Summon a hopping spider; shoots a web that immobilize enemies for 3s every 10s.
Spider.AbilityDescription.2: Summon a hopping spider; shoots a web that immobilize enemies for 4s every 9s.
Spider.AbilityDescription.3: Summon a hopping spider; shoots a web that immobilize enemies for 5s every 8s.
AngryRoger.Name: Angry Roger
AngryRoger.Dialog.1: Bring to me the flesh and spirit of the damned~~~
